mapper.select: SELECT ID, G_ID, GAME_IMG, GAMETITLE, AMOUNT FROM ORDERS WHERE PAYMENT_STATUS = 'NOT' AND M_ID = #{mId}
SELECT COUNT(G_ID) FROM ORDERS WHERE PAYMENT_STATUS = 'NOT' AND M_ID = #{mId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ORDERS WHERE PAYMENT_STATUS = 'NOT' AND M_ID = #{mId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDERS( M_ID, C_ID, G_ID, AMOUNT,GAMETITLE, GAME_IMG) VALUES (#{mId},#{cId},#{g_id},#{amount},#{gametitle},#{game_img})
mapper.select: SELECT ID, G_ID, GAME_IMG, GAMETITLE, AMOUNT FROM ORDERS WHERE ID = #{id}
SELECT AMOUNT FROM ORDERS WHERE ID = #{id}

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY ORDER_DATE DESC) AS RNO,
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY ORDER_DATE ASC) AS RNO,
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY AMOUNT ASC) AS RNO,
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY AMOUNT DESC) AS RNO,
DATE_FORMAT(ORDER_DATE, '%y-%m-%d') ORDER_DATE, GAMETITLE, AMOUNT FROM ORDERS WHERE M_ID = #{mId} AND PAYMENT_STATUS = 'COMPLETE'
SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(*), 0) COUNT FROM ORDERS WHERE M_ID = #{mId} AND PAYMENT_STATUS = 'COMPLETE'
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(AMOUNT), 0) PAYMENT_AMOUNT FROM ORDERS WHERE M_ID = #{mId} AND PAYMENT_STATUS = 'COMPLETE'

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(ORDER_DATE, '%y-%m') DESC) AS RNO,
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(ORDER_DATE, '%y-%m') ASC) AS RNO,
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY SUM(AMOUNT) DESC) AS RNO,
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY SUM(AMOUNT) ASC) AS RNO,
DATE_FORMAT(ORDER_DATE, '%y-%m') ORDER_DATE, GAMETITLE, SUM(AMOUNT) AMOUNT FROM ORDERS WHERE C_ID = #{cId} AND PAYMENT_STATUS = 'COMPLETE' GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(ORDER_DATE, '%y-%m'), GAMETITLE
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(AMOUNT), 0) AMOUNT FROM ORDERS WHERE C_ID = #{cId} AND PAYMENT_STATUS = 'COMPLETE' AND DATE_FORMAT(ORDER_DATE, '%y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%y-%m')
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(AMOUNT), 0) TOTAL_AMOUNT FROM ORDERS WHERE C_ID = #{cId} AND PAYMENT_STATUS = 'COMPLETE'

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY SUM(AMOUNT) DESC) AS RNO, M.MEMBER_ID USERID, O.GAMETITLE, SUM(AMOUNT) FROM ORDERS AS O INNER JOIN MEMBER AS M ON O.M_ID = M.ID WHERE C_ID = #{cId} AND PAYMENT_STATUS = 'COMPLETE' GROUP BY M.MEMBER_ID, O.GAMETITLE
